alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 12:44PM MST until January 13 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Lower Yampa River Basin and Debeque to Silt Corridor. * WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Yampa River Basin...isolated to scattered snow showers through the late afternoon and evening will create localized areas of blowing snow and temporary near whiteout conditions in the stronger gusts. Snow amounts of an inch or less are expected through tomorrow morning. In the Debeque to Silt corridor limited snow is expected. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. &&

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Lower Yampa River Basin
